#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Round.

== Name ==

*[CRound Round]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Round (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Details about a round of golf: Location of the flags on greens (usually called pin sheet),
			weather conditions, date of the round, opponenents and partners, and the scorecard.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  ([CHolePlacements hole-placement]?, [CWeather weather]?, [CFourSome foursome]?, [CGolfGame game]?, [CRoomForExtension wager]?, date, [CScorecard scorecard]  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:dateTime || date ||  					Date and time of the round.				 ||
|| [CFourSome golfml:FourSome] || [CFourSome foursome] ||  					Player information for the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CGolfGame golfml:GolfGame] || [CGolfGame game] ||  					Information about the game(s) played during the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CHolePlacements golfml:HolePlacements] || [CHolePlacements hole-placement] ||  					Placement of holes for the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CScorecard golfml:Scorecard] || [CScorecard scorecard] ||  					Scorecard of the round for the player.				 ||
|| [CRoomForExtension golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension wager] ||  					Information about the wagers during the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CWeather golfml:Weather] || [CWeather weather] ||  					Weather information for the round of golf.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlayer Player]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Round">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hole-placement" type="golfml:HolePlacements">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="weather" type="golfml:Weather">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="foursome" type="golfml:FourSome">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="game" type="golfml:GolfGame">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="wager" type="golfml:RoomForExtension">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="date" type="xs:dateTime">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" name="scorecard" type="golfml:Scorecard">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence></xs:complexType>
----
